Results of David's Wrongdoing. David was made to feel bitterly the fruits of wrongdoing. His sons acted over the sins of which he had been guilty. Amnon committed a great crime. Absalom revenged it by slaying him. Thus was 
                                                                           97
David's sin brought continually to his mind, and he was made to feel the full weight of the injustice done to Uriah and Bathsheba.--4SGa 85-89.
